I'm an XL in Nike and Adidas; however, this XL is a bit tight on me. The colors are very pretty.", 'I love these Nike shirts! The material is excellent quality — not too thin, not too thick, just the right weight. They keep cool and comfortable, which makes them perfect for my fiancé whether he’s working outdoors or heading to the kids’ sporting events. Versatile, breathable, and stylish. Definitely a great buy for the price!', 'A mi hijo le gustò esa playera.', 'Muy lindos y buena calidad la tela maravillosa coinciden las talla lo recomiendo 1010.', 'So I bought a “new” shirt. Fit is perfect and it looks great. The shirt was delivered without any tags and smelled like body odor. I ordered four and the other three smelled fine and did have the tags. It’s pretty obvious that this was a returned shirt that someone didn’t want and was purchased as new from me.']}, 'Nike Youth Park VII Short Sleeve Jersey, BV6742-010': {'price': 28.97, 'brand': 'Nike', 'category': 'Sports', 'product_id': 'P033', 'rating': 4.5, 'reviews': ['Great quality shirts! My son loved them, and I would definitely purchase them again.', 'Love this shirt !!! Great panel back. Shirt holds it color.', 'Nicer than I expected. The Nike check is embroidered not just a vinyl. I will say the shirt is different than the Nike pro dri fit shirts but still a great shirt my son loves it.', 'My teen is pretty picky with the shorts he wears. The size was perfect. The soft gray color and quality fabric are a nice addition to the shirts he will wear. I bought it for the value for the money and the bonus was the breathabilty of the shirt.
